pageTitle: Which month are you claiming taxi costs costs for?
h1: Which month are you claiming taxi costs for?

validation.future: Date of travel must be in the past
validation.invalid: Date of travel must be a real date
validation.requiredMonth: The date of travel must include a month
validation.requiredYear: The date of travel must include a year
validation.nonNumericMonth: Enter the month using numbers only
validation.nonNumericYear: Enter the year using numbers only
